doc:
Oliver Hardy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oliver_Hardy 0 Oliver Norvell Hardy (born Norvell Hardy, January 18, 1892 – August 7, 1957) was an American comic actor and one half of Laurel and Hardy, the double act that began in the era of silent films and lasted from 1927 to 1951. He appeared with Stan Laurel in 107 short films, feature films, and cameo roles. He was credited with his first film Outwitting Dad in 1914. In some of his early works, he was billed as "Babe Hardy". Oliver_Norvell_Hardy ( born Norvell_Hardy , January_18_,_1892 – August_7_,_1957 ) was an_American_comic_actor and one_half of Laurel_and_Hardy , the_double_act that began in the_era of silent_films and lasted from 1927 to 1951 . He appeared with Stan_Laurel in 107_short_films , feature_films , and cameo_roles . He was_credited with his_first_film_Outwitting_Dad in 1914 . In some of his_early_works , he was_billed as " Babe_Hardy_" .
